p: Shinde and coworkers investigated the anti-inflammatory activity of C. deodara wood EO in adjuvant arthritic male albino rats [ 31]. The oil (50 and 100 mg/kg) was administered orally 5 days prior to injection of FCA, and it was administered until day 30. C. deodara wood EO inhibited the acute phase of adjuvant-induced response (first 7 days following the injection of FCA). Moreover, the EO showed analgesic activity against acetic-acid-induced writhing and hot plate reaction in mice.
